snippet.title: The Last Faith - Kickstarter "Muramasa" Teaser
snippet.description:
🔥 WISHLIST ON STEAM: https://bit.ly/2C4QOr3
🔥 JOIN DISCORD NOW: https://discord.gg/D99gv9f

Missed our Kickstarter campaign?? don't worry, LATE BACKERS page live now: https://kumisoulsgames.pledgemanager.com/projects/the-last-faith-a-dark-gothic-metroidvania/participate/

----------

The Last Faith is an exploration-based Metroidvania, action side-scrolling platformer with dark and gothic horror themes at its core. 

The game's plan is to be released on Steam (PC/Mac), Nintendo Switch, Playstation 4 and Xbox One.

----------

WISHLIST ON STEAM: https://bit.ly/2C4QOr3
JOIN THE NEWSLETTER NOW http://bit.ly/35p7suP
PRESSKIT: http://bit.ly/3dPQxWe

----------

Website → https://www.thelastfaithgame.com
Discord → https://discord.gg/D99gv9f
Twitter → https://twitter.com/lastfaithgame
Facebook → https://www.facebook.com/lastfaithgame
Instagram → https://www.instagram.com/lastfaithgame
Youtube → https://www.youtube.com/kumisoulsgames
Steam → https://bit.ly/2C4QOr3
Kickstarter → https://bit.ly/2YnwuK9
